sources.title: Christmas Miracle At Sage Creek (Full Movie) PG | Western, Family |David Carradine, Wes Studi,
sources.description:
With a history of feuding, horse rustling and violence the Franklin and Red Eagle families are well known rivals in the lawless western frontier.  Set against the breathtaking backdrop of Wyomingâ€™s majestic open range, Miracle at Sage Creek is an uplifting western classic; a story of faith, filled with action and suspense that will thrill the whole family.
aka Miracle At Sage Creek.  
Family.  Action.  Drama.

Directed by James Intveld
2005
Starring David Carradine (Kill Bill Vol. 2), Wes Studi (Avatar), Michael Parks (Django Unchained), Tracy Nelson (Father Dowling Mysteries), Mark Rolston (Shawshank Redemption), Martin Kove (Karate Kid), Buck Taylor (Hell or Highwater), Rance Howard (A Beautiful Mind), Tim Abell (We Were Soldiers), Irene Bedard (The Tree of Life)
Rated PG
